content: this crochet triangle shawl pattern is easy peasy and creates a gorgeous shawl with the perfect drape to wrap around your neck doubling as a scarf **video tutorial ** https //youtu be/scyl9r9xl_u **materials ** to make this shawl you will need the following supplies -7 skeins approx 700 yards hobbii amigo xl worsted weight yarn in walnut a05 -size i-9 5 5 mm crochet hook -scissors -tapestry/yarn needle for weaving in ends **measurements ** finished shawl measures 67 wide x 38 long after blocking **skill level ** ﻿beginner
